FuncDef:
The import vpn-instance command binds a specified VPN instance to an address pool.
The undo import vpn-instance command unbinds a spcified VPN instance from an address pool.
By default,  a specified VPN instance is not bound to an address pool.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
An address pool can be bound with a maximum of eight VPN instances.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
